scenarios.title: Test Scenario 1: Create Cart Item
scenarios.description: This test demonstrates how to create a new cart item using a POST request. The request includes testing: true to indicate this is a test request.
checklistItems: Go to database and verify new cart record was created
Check that 'userId' field matches 'user-123'
Check that 'quantity' field is 2
Check that 'status' field is 'active'
Verify 'testing' flag was set to true in the request
Check timestamp fields (createdAt, updatedAt)

scenarios.title: Test Scenario 2: Get Cart Items by User ID
scenarios.description: This test demonstrates how to retrieve cart items for a specific user using a GET request with user ID input field.
checklistItems: Enter a user ID in the input field above
Click 'Test API Call' to execute the request
Verify API response contains cart items for the specified user
Check that response includes correct user ID
Verify item count matches database count for that user

scenarios.title: Test Scenario 3: Get Cart Items by Status
scenarios.description: This test demonstrates how to retrieve cart items filtered by status using a GET request with select dropdown.
checklistItems: Select a status from the dropdown above
Click 'Test API Call' to execute the request
Verify API response contains only cart items with selected status
Check that all returned items have the correct status
Verify item count matches database count for that status

scenarios.title: Test Scenario 4: Update Cart Item with Inputs
scenarios.description: This test demonstrates how to update an existing cart item using a PUT request with user ID input and status select dropdown.
checklistItems: Enter a user ID in the input field
Select a status from the dropdown
Click 'Test API Call' to execute the request
Go to database and find the updated cart item
Verify 'status' field was updated to selected value
Check that 'price' field was updated
Check that 'updatedAt' timestamp was updated
Verify 'testing' flag was included in the request
